languages.text: "Будьте прокляты вы и весь ваш род! Без меня вы все подохнете!"
"A blight upon you and all your kin! You are all doomed without me!"
languages.original_text: "Будьте прокляты вы и весь ваш род! Без меня вы все подохнете!"

traits.locale_text: "A blight upon you and your entire kin! You are all doomed without me!"
"A blight upon you and all your kin! You are all doomed without me!"
"A blight upon you and all your kin! You are all doomed without me!"
"A blight upon you and all your kin! You are all doomed without me!"
"A blight upon you and all your kin! You are all doomed without me!"

languages.text: "Ihr und Euresgleichen seid verflucht! Ohne mich seid Ihr alle verloren!"
languages.original_text: "A blight upon you and all your kin! You are all doomed without me!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr und Euresgleichen seid verflucht! Ohne mich seid Ihr alle verloren!"

languages.text: « Soyez maudits, vous et les vôtres ! Sans moi, vous êtes tous condamnés ! »
languages.original_text: "A blight upon you and all your kin! You are all doomed without me!"

traits.locale_text: « Soyez maudits, vous et les vôtres ! Sans moi, vous êtes tous condamnés ! »

languages.text: “你和你们所有的族人都完蛋了！没了我，你们只有死路一条！”
languages.original_text: "A blight upon you and all your kin! You are all doomed without me!"

traits.locale_text: “你和你们所有的族人都完蛋了！没了我，你们只有死路一条！”

languages.text: «¡Malditos seáis tú y toda tu estirpe! ¡Estáis condenados sin mí!».
languages.original_text: "A blight upon you and all your kin! You are all doomed without me!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Malditos seáis tú y toda tu estirpe! ¡Estáis condenados sin mí!».

languages.text: 「あんたとその一族みんなに災いあれ！私がいなければ、あんたたちは全滅よ！」
languages.original_text: "A blight upon you and all your kin! You are all doomed without me!"

traits.locale_text: 「あんたとその一族みんなに災いあれ！私がいなければ、あんたたちは全滅よ！」

languages.text: "Sana ve soyuna lanet olsun! Bensiz hepiniz mahvolacaksınız!"
languages.original_text: "A blight upon you and all your kin! You are all doomed without me!"

traits.locale_text: "Sana ve soyuna lanet olsun! Bensiz hepiniz mahvolacaksınız!"
